languages.text: "О судне с десятиной". {n}Последнее слово мужчина произносит с особым нажимом.{/n} "Корабль, набитый планетарной податью за внушительный период, не выходит на связь с тех пор, как покинул Райкад Минорис".

"It's 'about' a tithe ship," {n}he says forcefully.{/n} "A vessel loaded to the brim with planetary tithes — amassed over a considerable period — suddenly went dark as soon as it departed Rykad Minoris."
languages.original_text: "О судне с десятиной". {n}Последнее слово мужчина произносит с особым нажимом.{/n} "Корабль, набитый планетарной податью за внушительный период, не выходит на связь с тех пор, как покинул Райкад Минорис".

traits.locale_text: "It's 'about' a tithe ship," {n}he says forcefully.{/n} "A vessel loaded with planetary contributions for a significant period of time went dark as soon as it departed Rykad Minoris."

languages.text: "Dieses "Schiff" ist ein Steuerschiff", {n}erklärt er forsch.{/n} "Ein bis zum Rand mit planetaren Steuern gefülltes Schiff – dem über einen längeren Zeitraum erhobene Zehnt – ist kurz nach seinem Abflug von Rykad Minoris vom Radar verschwunden."
languages.original_text: "It's 'about' a tithe ship," {n}he says forcefully.{/n} "A vessel loaded to the brim with planetary tithes — amassed over a considerable period — suddenly went dark as soon as it departed Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses "Schiff" ist ein Steuerschiff", {n}erklärt er forsch.{/n} "Ein bis zum Rand mit planetaren Steuern gefülltes Schiff – dem über einen längeren Zeitraum erhobene Zehnt – ist kurz nach seinem Abflug von Rykad Minoris vom Radar verschwunden."

languages.text: « Il s'agit d'un vaisseau chargé du transport de la dîme, {n}assène-t-il avec force.{/n} Cet engin chargé à ras bord de dîmes planétaires – accumulées depuis si longtemps – s'est soudainement volatilisé lors de son départ de Rykad Minoris. »
languages.original_text: "It's 'about' a tithe ship," {n}he says forcefully.{/n} "A vessel loaded to the brim with planetary tithes — amassed over a considerable period — suddenly went dark as soon as it departed Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit d'un vaisseau chargé du transport de la dîme, {n}assène-t-il avec force.{/n} Cet engin chargé à ras bord de dîmes planétaires – accumulées depuis si longtemps – s'est soudainement volatilisé lors de son départ de Rykad Minoris. »

languages.text: «No es una nave cualquiera», {n}espeta.{/n} «Iba cargada hasta los topes de diezmos planetarios, amasados durante un periodo de tiempo considerable, y se perdió el contacto con ella nada más despegar de Rykad Minoris».
languages.original_text: "It's 'about' a tithe ship," {n}he says forcefully.{/n} "A vessel loaded to the brim with planetary tithes — amassed over a considerable period — suddenly went dark as soon as it departed Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: «No es una nave cualquiera», {n}espeta.{/n} «Iba cargada hasta los topes de diezmos planetarios, amasados durante un periodo de tiempo considerable, y se perdió el contacto con ella nada más despegar de Rykad Minoris».

languages.text: “那是一艘装载着什一税的船。”{n}他强调道。{/n}“满载着献给帝国的什一税，那些资源是花了很长时间才积累起来的。它才刚刚离开小莱卡德，就马上失去了音讯。”
languages.original_text: "It's 'about' a tithe ship," {n}he says forcefully.{/n} "A vessel loaded to the brim with planetary tithes — amassed over a considerable period — suddenly went dark as soon as it departed Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: “那是一艘装载着什一税的船。”{n}他强调道。{/n}“满载着献给帝国的什一税，那些资源是花了很长时间才积累起来的。它才刚刚离开小莱卡德，就马上失去了音讯。”

languages.text: 「租税船のこと『らしい』です」{n}彼は強い口調で言った。{/n}「長い年月をかけて租税を満載した船が、ライカド・ミノリスを出発した直後に突然消息を絶ちました」
languages.original_text: "It's 'about' a tithe ship," {n}he says forcefully.{/n} "A vessel loaded to the brim with planetary tithes — amassed over a considerable period — suddenly went dark as soon as it departed Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: 「租税船のこと『らしい』です」{n}彼は強い口調で言った。{/n}「長い年月をかけて租税を満載した船が、ライカド・ミノリスを出発した直後に突然消息を絶ちました」

languages.text: "Bir aşar gemisi." {n}Zorlanarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Hatırı sayılır bir zamandır biriktirilen gezegen aşarıyla dolu bir gemi, Rykad Minoris'ten ayrılır ayrılmaz hiçliğe karıştı."
languages.original_text: "It's 'about' a tithe ship," {n}he says forcefully.{/n} "A vessel loaded to the brim with planetary tithes — amassed over a considerable period — suddenly went dark as soon as it departed Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: "Bir aşar gemisi." {n}Zorlanarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Hatırı sayılır bir zamandır biriktirilen gezegen aşarıyla dolu bir gemi, Rykad Minoris'ten ayrılır ayrılmaz hiçliğe karıştı."

languages.original_text: "It's 'about' a tithe ship," {n}he says forcefully.{/n} "A vessel loaded to the brim with planetary tithes — amassed over a considerable period — suddenly went dark as soon as it departed Rykad Minoris."
